Room.Name: Main Street
Room.ShortDescription: Main Street continues to the north and south. Nylandian Bay is to the north.
Room.LongDescription: This is a popular shopping district for the citizens of Oceancrest. Small shops and cafes line the street on both sides, providing a variety of goods and services. The Oceancrest Opera House is on the east side of the street, and immediately to the west is a wedding shop.
